title: Screen record is not working. I get the "Error deleting screen recording" message
content:
I have updated my phone, updated the photos app, and cleared a few caches as suggested by support. Nothing has helped. I start a recording, it seems fine, then when I click tap to stop I get "Error deleting screen recording".

In searching other posts for help people mentioned issues with a Movies folder, but I can't even find a Movies folder.
